text: Oxyinae is subfamily of grasshoppers in the family Acrididae. Species are distributed throughout Africa (including Madagascar) and Australasia. == Genera == According to the Orthoptera Species File there are two clearly defined tribes, Oxyini and Praxibulini, and other genera of uncertain affiliation:Orthoptera Species File Tribe Oxyini Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 Tribe Praxibulini Rehn, 1957 – Australian *Kosciuscola Sjöstedt, 1934 *Methiola Sjöstedt, 1920 *Methiolopsis Rehn, 1957 *Praxibulus Bolívar, 1906 Not placed in a tribe: == References == * Ingrisch, S. , F.Willemse & S. Shishodia 2004: New species and interesting records of Acrididae (Orthoptera) from northeast India. Tijdschrift voor Entomologie 147, pages 289–320 Category:Orthoptera subfamilies Category:Taxa named by Carl Brunner von Wattenwyl
title: Oxyinae
